Title: Change The Title To Say Flickr for React
Description:
**WHEN** Andrew launches the application
**THEN** He should see a title labeled "Flickr for React"

**ACCEPTANCE**
- A title set to "Flickr for React" is visible at the top of the screen

Title: Andrew can see a list of descriptions displayed as <li>
Description:
**WHEN** Andrew launches the application
**THEN** He should see a list of items with text describing a Flickr Image (placeholder text for now)

**ACCEPTANCE**
- Each list item has placeholder description saying "Flickr"

Title: Andrew can see a placeholder image in each list item
Description:
**WHEN** Andrew launches the application
**THEN** He should see a placeholder image next to the description in each list item

**ACCEPTANCE**
- The image should be placed next to the text

Title: Andrew can see the image and description populated from Flickr's Public API
Description:
**WHEN** Andrew launches the application
**THEN** He should see the image and title populated in the list view

**ACCEPTANCE**
- Image should be populated using the media link from the Flickr API
- Text should be populated using the title field from the Flickr API

**NOTE**
Use the following public API from Flickr:
- http://api.flickr.com/services/feeds/photos_public.gne?format=json&nojsoncallback=true


**HELPFUL LINKS**
- [window.fetch](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Fetch_API/Using_Fetch)

Title: Clicking The Image Should Make The Text Bold
Description: Clicking the image should make the description next to it bold

Title: Clicking the image again should make it not bold
